https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lTLV8wHZffCBijqpshvX0pexYsW.jpg In this deeply personal film, director Roger Ross Williams sets out on a journey to understand the complex forces of racism and greed currently at work in America's prison system. American Jail
